sentences.sContent: Many of the families are forced to live at the subsistence level.
sentences.sCn: 很多家庭被迫生活在基本生活水准线上。

sentences.sContent: The land provided subsistence and little more.
sentences.sCn: 这块土地只能提供人们的基本生活所需，别无富余。

phrases.pCn: 勉强糊口的生活水平；贫困生存线；维持生活的最低水平

remMethod.val: subsist(生存) + ence → 生存， 生计

trans.tranOther: the condition of only just having enough money or food to stay alive
